title: ADC discussion Piglet and Gosu
body:
I still remember a few weeks ago, gosu was like 25 wins 2 losses as ADC in gold, Gosu he has now got his account into challenger or master I think... and then Piglet, he  has got into master 1 with an insane W/L similar to gosu but I would argue Piglet is a superior adc to gosu. 

I hear people saying "ADC is the worst role to carry with in soloqueue" but these guys have insane W/L in gold/silver. I am just curious as to how guys like piglet and gosu come out with the insane W/L and what separates them from your typical silver/gold ADC.

replies.body:
1. Boost Juice.
2. Rigged matches.
3. ADC is OP.
4. "Guys" don't exist.
5. Everybody is bad.

Choose your answer.
